resources.string:
Things to know: Illage Summer camp is a queer-founded, community-oriented, ally-supported, unicorn-inspired experience of pure magic. 

 You don't need to sign up for an activity, just show up!

 Respect the Illage community -- treat everyone with love, dignity, and compassion. Honor each other's identities and experiences. Don't make assumptions. Always do your best and be aware of each other. (This rule was written by our fiends at A-Camp)

 Camp runs on donations. Please bring cash to contribute. No one turned away for lack of funds!
Your event has been Added! \n\nWould You Like To Add Another Event?

Illage Summer Camp is a volunteer driven effort! If you have questions or suggestions, or want to participate through volunteering, please get in touch! You can reach us through the contact form below, and visit us on the web.
Fill out this form to get in touch! We will get back to you as soon as we can.
There are no events starting in the next three hours. But check the full schedule to see what is happening later tonight and tomorrow!
